title: account_entry
name: account_entry
description: A line entry for a document

price_single.description: Net price of a single entry. If a product id is given, price_single is taken from the product if not set.

net_total.description: Net price of a single entry. Calculated from price_single * quantity

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

_destroy.description: When set an existing entry will be deleted. This switch is used for entries passed during batch operations.
